mapper.select: select w.word, w.wordnum, w.meaningk, w.meaningj, w.wordlevel, m.wordtype from word w left outer join (select word, wordtype from myword where userid =#{userid} and wordtype='star') m on w.word = m.word where wordlevel=#{wordlevel}
select word, meaningk, meaningJ, wordtype from myword where userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from myword where word=#{word} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select word from exceptionword where status = 1
